title: Node.js File System and HTTP Module
content: This project demonstrates the use of Node.js's file system and HTTP modules. It includes a simple server that serves static files and handles basic file operations.

title: Understanding Node.js Modules
content: Node.js modules are reusable blocks of code that can be exported from one file and imported into another. This project illustrates how to create and use modules effectively.

title: Using Nodemon for Development
content: Nodemon is a utility that monitors for changes in your source code and automatically restarts your server. This project includes a setup for using Nodemon during development.
